member.name: OLEGETMONIKER
member.summary: Controls aspects of the behavior of the and methods.

member.name: OLEGETMONIKER.OLEGETMONIKER_ONLYIFTHERE
member.summary: If a moniker for the object or container does not exist, should return E_FAIL and not assign a moniker.

member.name: OLEGETMONIKER.OLEGETMONIKER_FORCEASSIGN
member.summary: If a moniker for the object or container does not exist, should create one.

member.name: OLEGETMONIKER.OLEGETMONIKER_UNASSIGN
member.summary: can release the object's moniker (although it is not required to do so). This constant is not valid in .

member.name: OLEGETMONIKER.OLEGETMONIKER_TEMPFORUSER
member.summary: If a moniker for the object does not exist, can create a temporary moniker that can be used for display purposes () but not for binding. This enables the object server to return a descriptive name for the object without incurring the overhead of creating and maintaining a moniker until a link is actually created.
